getting_started.label: Getting Started / Support
getting_started.comment:
• Instructional video on how to set up the Adyen Magento plugin
  • Download the Quick Quick Integration Guide
  • Download the more advanced manual
  • Sign up for a test account
  • The latest version of the Adyen Magento module is also available through GitHub.

If you have any further questions, please visit the Adyen.com website or email magento@adyen.com.

merchantAccount.label: Merchant Account
merchantAccount.comment: You can find this in the Adyen back-office. The Adyen back-office can be found on https://ca-test.adyen.com for test or https://ca-live.adyen.com for live.
merchantAccount.tooltip: If you did not find it check out our Magento Quick Integration Guide

demoMode.label: Test/Production Mode
demoMode.comment: In test mode you must use test cards. You can find them here

order_status.label: New order status
order_status.comment: Select only status assigned to state new

payment_authorized.label: Order status authorised payment
payment_authorized.comment: (optional)Select only status assigned to state processing.Leave empty if you are not sure

payment_authorized_virtual.label: Order status authorised payment for virtual products
payment_authorized_virtual.comment: (optional)Select only status assigned to state complete. Leave empty to use the same as normal products

payment_pre_authorized.label: Order status pre-authorised payment
payment_pre_authorized.comment: (optional)Only affecting manual work flow.Leave empty if you are not sure

payment_cancelled.label: Order status cancelled payment
payment_cancelled.comment: Action to be attempted incase of failed notifications from Adyen.Notice orders with invoices can not be cancelled, will just get status change.

refund_authorized.label: Refund authorise (refund success)
refund_authorized.comment: (optional) leave empty if you are not sure

pending_status.label: Pending order status
pending_status.comment: By default pending notifications are not send. If you want these notifications to be received enable the BankTransfer Pending Notification and\or Direct-Debit Pending Notification in the Adyen Platform

send_update_mail.label: Order update email
send_update_mail.comment: When an order status is changed, should we send an email

capture_on_shipment.label: Capture on shipment
capture_on_shipment.comment: If you enable this function it will do a capture request to adyen platform if you do a shipment

send_invoice_update_mail.label: Invoice email
send_invoice_update_mail.comment: When an invoice is created, should we send an email

send_email_bank_sepa_on_pending.label: Send confirmation email for Banktransfer/SEPA
send_email_bank_sepa_on_pending.comment: Send a confirmation mail after banktranfer/SEPA is placed (not yet paid). Make sure that you have BankTransfer Pending Notification enabled in Adyen backoffice to do this contact magento@adyen.com

notification_username.label: Notification Username
notification_username.comment: Should match your "notifications settings" in your Adyen account.

notification_password.label: Notification Password
notification_password.comment: Should match your "notifications settings" in your Adyen account.

notification_hmac.label: Notification Hmac Key
notification_hmac.comment: This is not required. You can use this as extra security or if you do not want to use HTTP AUTHENTICATION you can leave notification username and password empty and only use this key. Key can be generated in the Adyen backoffice => Server Communication => Additional Settings

capture_mode.label: Capture Mode
capture_mode.comment: If you are using "The manual capture in Adyen" set this to manual and you will get a chance to capture it by creating the invoice and select "capture online".If not sure select auto.Notice:iDEAL and Cash are always Auto Capture!

create_pending_invoice.label: Create a pending invoice
create_pending_invoice.comment: This will create an pending invoice if the AUTHORISATION notification is received

auto_capture_openinvoice.label: Auto capture Openinvoice(AfterPay/Klarna) payment methods
auto_capture_openinvoice.comment: By default OpenInvoice is set to manual capture. If you want auto capture you need to contact magento@adyen.com so we can set this up for your account and then you can set this option to yes

paypal_capture_mode.label: Capture Mode for PayPal
paypal_capture_mode.comment: If you are using a different capture mode for PayPal setup in your Adyen account select here this capture modus

ignore_refund_notification.label: Ignore refund notification
ignore_refund_notification.comment: If the refund is done on the Adyen Platform it will send a refund notification to Magento that automatically create a credit memo. If you enable this setting this will not happen because it will not process any of the REFUND notification that is received.

update_notification_cronjob.label: Update notification queue by cronjob (every 5 minutes)
update_notification_cronjob.comment: If you using API methods(CC, SEPA, ELV or Boleto) and your magento order processing is slow it could be that the notificaiton is faster then magento saves the ordrer. The notification will then be saved in a queue. This is processed on default when next notification is received. If you want to update the notificaiton queue every 5 minutes activate this and make sure cronjob of magento is called by your webserver

billing_agreements.label: Billing Agreements
billing_agreements.comment:
ONECLICK: The shopper opts in to storing their card details for future use. The shopper is present for the subsequent transaction, for cards the security code (CVC/CVV) is required.

RECURRING: Payment details are stored for future use. For cards, the security code (CVC/CVV) is not required for subsequent payments.

ONECLICK, RECURRING: Payment details are stored for future use. This allows the use of the stored payment details regardless of whether the shopper is on your site or not.

recurringtypes.label: Agreement Type
recurringtypes.comment: When enabled users can save their Credit Cards and their SEPA authorizations

ws_password_test.label: Adyen ws password for Test
ws_password_test.comment: The password of the ws user for Test

ws_password_live.label: Adyen ws password for Live
ws_password_live.comment: The password of the ws user for Live

shopperlocale.label: Language locale (optional)
shopperlocale.comment: Leave empty to let Magento decide (Ex: nl_NL)

countryCode.label: Country Code ISO (optional)
countryCode.comment: Leave empty to let Adyen decide on IP-address (Ex: NL)

manual_review.label: Manual Review
manual_review.comment: Adyen's Risk analysis tool allows merchants to confgure when a transaction should be rejected or accepted depending on certain characteristics of the payment. If you want this to be turned on please contact magento@adyen.com

fraud_manual_review_status.label: Manual Review Status
fraud_manual_review_status.comment: If you are using Manual Review and a payment match your case set here the status it should have in magento. It will then move to processing when you approve the payment on Adyen platform. If you don't have this or don't want a seperate status please keep it on -- Please Select --

fraud_manual_review_accept_status.label: Manual Review Accepted Status
fraud_manual_review_accept_status.comment: If you do not have an action defined when you accept a manual review you can define a status here. If you have already an action that will be executed or don't want a seperate status please keep it on -- Please Select --

skinCode.label: Skin Code
skinCode.comment: The skin code you want to use (You can find this in the admin are of your Adyen account)

secret_wordt.label: HMAC Key for Test
secret_wordt.comment: Should match with the HMAC test key in the Adyen backoffice.

secret_wordp.label: HMAC Key for Live
secret_wordp.comment: Should match with the HMAC live key in the Adyen backoffice.

delivery_days.label: Days for Delivery
delivery_days.comment: How many days to be added to the current date for delivery. ONLY numbers allowed.

disable_hpptypes.label: Leave payment method selection on HPP
disable_hpptypes.comment: If you say yes here, payment methods in the checkout won't be displayed and you will be redirected to the Adyen HPP to make the selection.

payment_routines.label: Payment Flow Selection
payment_routines.comment: Adyen provide you with 2 types of payment routines. Multi-page and Single Page

return_url_in_request.label: Return url in request
return_url_in_request.comment: If you have a multi webshop and you want to use one skin only, enable this option

show_ideal_logos.label: Show iDEAL bank logos
show_ideal_logos.comment: Show iDEAL bank logos (radio buttons) instead of dropdown

recurringtypes.label: Recurring Type
recurringtypes.comment: You can set different value for POS because you have to have the permission of the customer

add_receipt_order_lines.label: Add orderlines to receipt
add_receipt_order_lines.comment: If you have the Adyen App configured to print to an external printer the orderlines can be printed on to the receipt if you turn this option on.

enable_scanner.label: Enable Scanner
enable_scanner.comment: If you enable this you have the possiblity to scan products with a hand scanner on the shopping cart page and this will automatically add products to the shopping cart based on the same SKU name

auto_submit_scanner.label: Auto submit scanner
auto_submit_scanner.comment: If you have a scanner that puss a enter command after scanning turn this setting on.

express_checkout.label: Express checkout
express_checkout.comment: This will show a checkout buttton on the shopping cart to directly do a POS payment without going to the checkout steps. You must be logged into your magento account on the front-end to see the button

express_checkout_redirect_connect.label: Redirect direct
express_checkout_redirect_connect.comment: Redirect directly to the Adyen app to do the PIN payment. This is not supported for all browsers if you have problems set this setting to false

express_checkout_kiosk_mode.label: Kiosk mode
express_checkout_kiosk_mode.comment: If you turn kiosk modus on it will not autocomplete the customers based on the filled in email address

express_checkout_recurring.label: Show Recurring Cards
express_checkout_recurring.comment: This will show the recurring cards beneath the express checkout and makes it possible to do a recurring online payment by clicking on the card

create_shipment.label: Create Shipment
create_shipment.comment: If you enable this there will be automatically be created a shipment if the invoice is created

ip_filter.label: IP filter
ip_filter.comment: Enable IP filter let's you define an IP range when this payment method is visable

create_shipment.label: Create Shipment
create_shipment.comment: If you enable this there will be automatically be created a shipment if the invoice is created

cash_express_checkout.label: Cash Express checkout
cash_express_checkout.comment: This will show a checkout buttton on the shopping cart to directly do a Cash payment without going to the checkout steps. Make sure that you have Cash enabled on your skin and HPP payment method is enabled and correctly configured. You must be logged into your magento account on the front-end to see the button

cash_drawer.label: Open Cash Drawer
cash_drawer.comment: Open the Cash drawer if you connect this to your printer this works for all Epson ePOS-Device printers

cash_drawer_printer_ip.label: IP address printer
cash_drawer_printer_ip.comment: Enter here the IP address of the printer where the cash drawer is connected to

cash_drawer_printer_port.label: Printer port
cash_drawer_printer_port.comment: Enter here the port number of the printer where the cash drawer is connected to

cash_drawer_printer_device_id.label: Printer Device ID
cash_drawer_printer_device_id.comment: Enter here the deviceID of the printer where the cash drawer is connected to

ip_filter.comment: Enable IP filter let's you define an IP range when this payment method is visable

different_address_disable.comment: If the delivery address and billing address in the checkout is not the same disable this payment method because Klarna will most likely reject it

failed_attempt_disable.label: Disable this payment method if first attempt is refused
failed_attempt_disable.comment: If the first attempt is refused don't show this as an payment option for the current quote

order_overpaid_status.label: Order status overpaid
order_overpaid_status.comment: With Boleto it is possible to pay more than the total amount. Select here the status if this is the case. If you leave this empty it will take the Order status authorised payment as default status
